Package breakout.entities.projectiles.orbs

Class Orb

java.lang.Object
breakout.core.entities.Entity
breakout.core.entities.projectiles.Projectile
breakout.core.entities.projectiles.GuidedProjectile
breakout.entities.projectiles.orbs.Orb
All Implemented Interfaces:
Collidable, CollisionInitiable, DefaultDependenciesInjectable
Direct Known Subclasses:
StandardOrb
public abstract class Orb extends GuidedProjectile
Orb is a projectile that can be launched at an angle.

    • randomizeAngle

      public void randomizeAngle(double range)
      Randomizes the angle of movement to prefer square-like directions. This method adjusts the angle of movement so that it aligns closely to one of the cardinal four directions (right, down, left, or up). The angle is normalized to be within the range of 0 to 2π radians.
      Parameters:
      range - The range (in radians) to randomize the angle.

    • hasAttacked

      public boolean hasAttacked()
